item.title: For Netanyahu, Trump’s Nod to Peace Puts Him in a Tough Spot
item.description: The Israeli leader thought he had a plan from the U.S. president that would have represented total victory over Hamas. Suddenly, it looks as though he...

item.title: Netanyahu Says Israel and Hamas Are on the Brink of a Hostage Deal
item.description: Both sides have reacted positively to a United States proposal for a cease-fire, but many details remain to be ironed out, including whether Hamas wil...

item.title: Hamas Partially Accepts Trump’s Peace Plan
item.description: Hamas said it would release all Israeli hostages but wants to negotiate elements of President Trump’s peace plan for Gaza. Adam Rasgon, a reporter for...

item.title: Trapped in the Homes They Thought Would Protect Them
item.description: Some victims of the Cebu earthquake in the Philippines lived in homes that were supposed to withstand natural disasters.

item.title: At a Protest for a Deal, Israelis Wrestle With a Mix of Emotions
item.description: Along with optimism that President Trump can lock Israel and Hamas into a deal, many expressed anxiety about being disappointed once more.
